hypothesis_content.title: Meme Coin (DOGE/PEPE) Intraday Extreme Fade
hypothesis_content.statement: During NEUTRAL or BULL regimes, when a meme coin (DOGE or PEPE) experiences a 1-hour price surge of >12% on elevated but not peak volume (volume > 1.5x 20-hour avg but < 5x avg), a short position will be profitable as the spike rapidly retraces within the next 4 hours.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Meme coins are driven heavily by retail sentiment and momentum chasing. Sharp, high-volume spikes in neutral/bull environments are often fueled by coordinated social media pumps or FOMO, which exhausts quickly due to low fundamental support, leading to swift retracements.
entry_conditions: 1-hour volume > 1.5x 20-hour avg volume AND < 5x 20-hour avg volume (to filter pump-and-dumps and news explosions)
No major, coin-specific news announcement in the last 2 hours

exit_conditions.take_profit: Price retraces 50% of the initial 1-hour spike
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Price moves another 5% above the entry candle's high

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Median retracement after entry is less than 25% of the initial spike, or stop-loss hit rate exceeds 40%.
